page.title: 12PLAYTIME AT KNEESALL SCHOOL
page.content: There are three classes in the school and the children play in mixed groups in the playground and on the field when the weather is fine. In wet weather it is too muddy to play on the field.If we stay indoors, we talk to our friends or draw. Outside we play lots of different games. In cold weather the boys usually play a game of football or a chasing game that keeps them warm.The girls like to run about and play Tiggy round the buildings.When summer comes we play cricket or practise sports. Then the girls can play pretend games with their dolls and make houses and dens out of the grass cuttings. Sometimes we just sit and talk to our friends or watch the people going by or the animals in the fields near to the playground.
